oai_dc:dc.dc:title: People challenges and what can be done to overcome them
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Buyers, Matt
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: livestock
personnel
leadership
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A targeted and practical overview of the tactics that can be employed to resolve common interpersonal challenges found in the livestock production industry is presented. A call to action for those seeking to help their clients improve their businesses.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2015; 25-32
